title: gazebo7 branch doesn't build on homebrew

content.raw: The qt4 formula was recently removed from `homebrew-core` since it has been deprecated for a while. To support older versions of gazebo, I added a `qt4-no-webkit` formula to our `osrf/simulation` tap. As the name implies, this version of qt4 is built without webkit support, since the webkit version was old and deemed a security risk. The only problem is that gazebo7 requires webkit support. I've patched the gazebo7 formula with the commits from pull request #2371, so `brew install gazebo7` works, but building the gazebo7 branch from source doesn't work. We will need to backport pull request #2371 in an API-compatible way.
